law.catch_line: Grounds for fine or refusal to issue, renew, revoke, or suspend license.

text.section: Payments in lieu of suspension collected by the board shall be deposited in the State Treasury and credited to the general fund.
The board may require retesting of any licensee upon proper showing of gross malpractice or incompetence on the part of the licensee.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 13, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 202, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 14.
